data.title: Ella Peltonen, PhD
data.meta_description: I'm a Finnish citizen currently working at the University of Oulu as an assistant professor in Computer Science. Born 21.2.1989, happily married. Education University of Helsinki, Finland: PhD in Computer Science, 2/2018 MSc in Computer Science (Networking and Services), 2013 BSc in Computer Science (minor: Mathematics), 2012 Experience University of Oulu, Finland Jan 2022 -…
data.text:
I’m a Finnish citizen currently working at the University of Oulu as an assistant professor in Computer Science. Born 21.2.1989, happily married.

Education

University of Helsinki, Finland:

PhD in Computer Science, 2/2018

MSc in Computer Science (Networking and Services), 2013

BSc in Computer Science (minor: Mathematics), 2012

Experience

University of Oulu, Finland

Jan 2022 – present: Assistant Professor

Nov 2018 – Dec 2021: Postdoctoral Researcher (tutkijatohtori)

YEEA Work Oy, Finland

Jul – Dec 2018: Scientific Advisor

The Insight Centre for Data Analytics, University College Cork, Ireland

Jan – Nov 2018: Postdoctoral Researcher

Department of Computer Science, University of Helsinki, Finland

Oct 2013 – Dec 2017: PhD candidate, researcher

2012 – Sep 2013: Research assistant

2011 – 2012: Part-time teacher / Teaching assistant

Institute of Seismology, University of Helsinki, Finland

May 2011 – Dec 2011: Research assistant

Adult Education Center Edupoli, Finland

2010 – 2011: Part-time teacher

Awards

Sähkössä on tulevaisuus -palkinto, Sähköinsinöörit – SIL ry 2021

Rising Stars in Networking and Communications 2017 by N2 Women

Junior Researcher of the Year 2015 in CS Department, University of Helsinki

Marc Weiser Best Paper Award, PerCom 2015

Runner-up: Best PhD Forum Presentation Award, PerCom 2015

Junior Teacher of the Year 2012 in CS Department, University of Helsinki

Grants and Scholarships

Research Visits and Collaboration

University of Bamberg (visiting professor), Germany, October 2021

University of Melbourne, Australia, September-October 2018

University of Oulu, Finland, March 2017

University College London, UK, March-July 2016

University of Cambridge, UK, October 2014

University of California, Berkeley, USA, April-May 2014

Research-related Activities

Memberships and positions of trust in scientific organisations

2019-2022 ACM Future of Computing Academy (FCA) Member

2019-2020 ACM SIGCHI Communications Team Member

Administrative or working group positions

Coordinator of the Edge Intelligence Special Interest Group in Finland

Referee for scientific journals

Pervasive and Mobile Computing; International Journal of Human-Computer Studies; ACM Interactive, Mobile, Wearable and Ubiquitous Technologies (IMWUT)

Referee for conference proceedings

ACM Group 2022, The WebConference (WWW) 2021, IEEE Percom 2021 and 2020, EmotionAware 2021, AutomotiveUI 2020, IEEE SECON 2020, CASPer 2020, DIS 2020, MobileHCI 2020, CHI 2020 and 2019, CSCW 2019, MobiCASE 2019 and 2018

Organising scientific conferences

2021 Co-Chair, Dagstuhl Seminar on Edge Intelligence, Germany

2021 Financial Co-Chair, Ubicomp/ISWC, online

2021 Work in Progress Chair, IEEE Percom 2021, Germany

2020 Member of the local organisation committee and Track Chair, 6G Summit, Levi, Finland

2020 General chair, EdgeAI SIG Workshop, Oulu, Finland

2020 Publicity Chair, ACM Sensys 2020, Yokohama, Japan

2020 Publicity Chair, IEEE PerCom 2020, Austin, US

2019 Co-general Chair, UBISS Summer School, Oulu, Finland

2019 Committee Member, 8th Networking Networking Women Workshop, NY, US

2019 Publicity Chair, ACM MobiCom 2019, Los Cabos, Mexico

2019 Publicity Chair, PerCrowd 2019, Kyoto, Japan

2015 Student Committee Member, ACM S3 Workshop 2015, Paris, France

In addition, I do reviews for several journals, workshops, conference demo and poster sessios, and doctoral consortiums.

Selected Talks

Towards edge-native artificial intelligence, AI Day, Espoo, 26.11.2019

When fiction meets reality: AI in science and science fiction (general talk), 7.7.2019, Finncon, Jyväskylä. Slides

IoT ja teollinen IoT. Technical talk, IoT ja tekoäly metallurgiassa -koulutus, Pohto täydennyskoulutustalo, Oulu (in Finnish) 24.4.2019

Data Science Workshop – Big Data ja hajautettu laskenta. Ompeluseura LevelUP koodarit -naisverkoston seminaari. Technical talk, Miracle Finland Oy, Helsinki, 13.12.2018

Tekoäly?! Tekoäly arjessa ja suomalaisessa työelämässä. General talk, Elinkeinoelämän Keskusliitto, 10.12.2018

Modern Mobile Culture. Scientific talk, University of Melbourne, Australia, 5.10.2018

The Hidden Image of Mobile Apps: Geographic, Demographic, and Cultural Factors in Mobile Usage. Scientific talk, MobileHCI 2018, Barcelona, Spain, 4.9.2018. Slides.

Case Studies IT-alan naisille. Mentoring workshop (in Finnish), Ompeluseura LevelUP Koodarit summer camp, Partaharju, Finland, 6.-8.7.2018

Artificial Intelligence in Fiction and Reality. Public general talk, Science fiction convention Finncon, Turku, Finland, 15.7.2018

Apache Spark Solutions for Scientific Computing. Technical talk, NUI Galway, Ireland, 8.5.2018. Slides

PhD Defence: Crowdsensed Mobile Data Analytics. Public defence, University of Helsinki, 26.2.2018. Slides

An Academic View to Cloud Computing. Industry talk, Solita, 30.11.2017. Slides

Ystävämme teknologia. Public general talk and panel discussion (in Finnish), Tiedekulma 8.11.2017

Crowdsensed Mobile Data Analytics: Cleaning, Learning, and the Value. Scientific talk, University College Cork, Ireland, 9.10.2017

Too Big to Mail: On the Way to Publish Large-scale Mobile Analytics Data. Scientific talk, Open Science in Big Data Workshop, Washington D.C., USA, 5.12.2016. Slides

Energy Modeling of System Settings: A Crowdsourced Approach. Scientific talk, IEEE Percom 2015, St. Louis, USA, 24.3.2015. Slides

A crowdsourced approach for mobile sensing: How distributed data mining meets mobile devices. Scientific talk, SRG seminar, University of Cambridge, UK, 9.10.2014

Distributed Machine Learning for Big Data and Sensing Applications. Technical talk,Workshop on Cloud and Mobile Computing, HKUST, Hong Kong, 2.7.2014

In addition, I’ve participated and moderated several panel discussions and interviews in Helsinki Book Fair, Finncon, and smaller events since 2009.

Technologies

In everyday use: Spark, Scala, Matlab, Bash, Linux command-line tools

Familiar with: Java, C, C++, Python, R, Octave, Processing, Web development tools, Graphic design tools

Languages

Native Finnish, full professional English (CEFR C2), intermediate Swedish and German (CEFR B2), basics in Russian and Latin

Teaching

University of Oulu, Finland:

Supervising MSc and BSc theses (from 2019)

Lecturer in Internet of Things (MSc, 2019-2021)

University of Bremen, Germany:

Lecturer in Internet of Things (all levels, summer 2019) Lecturer in Mobile Data Analytics (all levels, summer 2018)

University College Cork, Ireland:

Lecturer in Practical Statistics for Data Scientists (PhD, spring 2018)

University of Helsinki, Finland:

Supervised three Master’s Theses 2015 – 2017

Supervised nine Bachelor Theses 2013 – 2017

Assistant in course Location-Awareness (MSc, autumn 2016)

Assistant in course Big Data Frameworks (MSc, spring 2015)

Lecturer in course Spark Code Camp (MSc, summer 2014)

Co-lecturer in course Data Communication Project (BSc, spring 2013)

Assistant in course Introduction to Data Communication (BSc, autumns 2011, 2012)

Assistant in course Introduction to Computer Security (BSc, spring 2012)

Assistant in course Programming Project (BSc, spring 2012)

Assistant in course Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (BSc, autumn 2011)

Other Activities
